result.title: Insights and recommendations for ethics and policy at the interface between academic and citizen science - Intermediate report
result.description: D43 Insights and recommendations for ethics and policy at the interface between academic and citizen science Intermediate report Public report due at month 18 Lead EPThis deliverable elaborates on findings from T42 T43 T44 T45 It discusses findings related to the differences in academic and citizen science in order to modify and harmonise them It also deals with how the different relationships between citizens researchers and institutions affect the whole process of knowledge production validation and use

result.title: Insights and recommendations for ethics and policy at the interface between academic and citizen science - Final report
result.description: D44 Insights and recommendations for ethics and policy at the interface between academic and citizen science Final report Public report due at month 42 Lead EPThis deliverable elaborates on findings from T42 T43 T44 T45 It discusses findings related to the differences in academic and citizen science in order to modify and harmonise them It also deals with how the different relationships between citizens researchers and institutions affect the whole process of knowledge production validation and use The first version of D43 is delivered in M18 An updated final version D44 with new insights and forms of learning is delivered at the end of the project

result.title: Evaluation findings of local CS actions
result.description: D61 Evaluation findings of local CS actions Public report due at month 39 lead VDUThis deliverable presents an evaluation framework containing guidelines tools and indicators to evaluate the impact of citizen science projects in environmental epidemiology Moreover it presents the evaluation findings of the local CS actions

result.title: Report on the SIE City Lab in Mannheim; specifying insights regarding processes (incl. enabling and impeding conditions) and contributions of SIE
result.description: Deliverable D13 presents the experience of Mannheim City Lab with novel urban governance structures and practises for enabling social innovation in the energy sector The structure of the report is based on the template provided in D12 and its content will feed into the City Lab Guide D19 Output of T42
